articles.title: Apple Arcade’s ‘Timeless Classics’ Category Gives Old Games Fresh Appeal - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Apple Arcade added 30 new games to its collection in April 2020, along with two new categories including Timeless Classics and App Store Greats. The new additions give Apple Arcade a big boost, and make some old, simple games appealing once again.
